scripts.manifest:local: npm run manifest -- local local-31337-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:testing:amoy: npm run manifest -- testing testing-80002-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:testing:sepolia: npm run manifest -- testing testing-11155111-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:staging:amoy: npm run manifest -- staging staging-80002-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:staging:sepolia: npm run manifest -- staging staging-11155111-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:production: npm run manifest -- production production-137-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:production:ethereum: npm run manifest -- production production-1-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:local: npm run manifest:local && npm run create:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 boson/corecomponents -l 0.0.1
scripts.deploy:testing:amoy: npm run manifest:testing:amoy && graph deploy --studio --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ -l v0.0.1 boson-testing-amoy
scripts.deploy:testing:sepolia: npm run manifest:testing:sepolia && graph deploy --studio --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ -l v0.0.1 boson-testing-sepolia
scripts.deploy:staging:amoy: npm run manifest:staging:amoy && graph deploy --studio --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ -l v0.0.1 boson-staging-amoy
scripts.deploy:staging:sepolia: npm run manifest:staging:sepolia && graph deploy --studio --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ -l v0.0.1 boson-staging-sepolia
scripts.deploy:production: npm run manifest:production && graph deploy --studio --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ -l v0.0.1 boson-polygon
scripts.deploy:production:ethereum: npm run manifest:production:ethereum && graph deploy --studio --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ -l v0.0.1 boson-ethereum
